creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: pendant in the shape of a fish; pendant is two-sided and appears to be two fish, belly-to-belly; fish is hollow and mouth is open to interior; long chain, box style, with six-petal flower motifs joined by four rings in outer petals, attached to fish at fins, joined left side to right side approximately 9" from top
dimension: 26 x 5 7/8 x 1 3/4 in. (66.04 x 14.92 x 4.45 cm) (including chain)
title: Pendant
